title: Expert Workshop on Educational Material Quality Management and Policy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Educational planning and foundational knowledge in language instruction
context.additional_context: A program for corporate language education managers to improve their competencies in evaluating educational materials and establishing policies.

learning_goals: Learners can derive and apply at least three quality evaluation criteria for educational materials in workplace settings
Learners can enhance critical decision-making skills in the process of selecting educational materials using VR simulations
Learners can establish educational material quality management policies by designing an expert collaboration system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
